mapper.select: select d.dietCode, d.dietName, s.sideDImg from diet d,dietinfo di, sidedish s where d.diseaseCode=#{diseaseCode} and di.dietCode=d.dietCode and di.sideDCode=s.sideDCode order by d.dietCode
select o.dietCode, o.price, o.orderCode,o.orderDate, d.dietName,d.dietImg from orderlist o, diet d where o.dietCode = d.dietCode and o.id = #{id} and o.orderItemCode = 1
